LANGUAGE.LABEL: Email Presentation

Select a Presentation to email to your prospect. Your prospect will be emailed the message below with a link to the selected Presentation. You can optionally select an email template after you select a presentation.
Press [Shift]+[Enter] to insert a new line. The email message must contain {link} which will be replaced with the link to the Presentation.
